game_description: Enjoy VR like never before by having full control of your hands and fingers to interact physically with your environment and many different objects and experiences! Discover the unique universe of Hand Physics Lab where you will need to fulfill a variety of tasks and puzzles with nothing but your hands! You will go through more than 80 different puzzles and experiences to unlock multiple playgrounds where you will have full freedom to draw, build and play! From painting eggs with your fingers, building cube towers, using magnets and telekinesis, shaking hands with your clone, petting a virtual cat, and so much more! You will definitely put your hands in action! **Fully playable with hand tracking and/or touch controllers** **IMPORTANT NOTICE** The quality of your experience when using hand tracking will heavily depend on your lighting conditions. Please read the guidelines (in-game) on how to optimize your play space for best hand tracking conditions.

The physics are amazing and they remind me of 2015 boneworks physics. Something I want though is a life sized NPC so you can play and mess around with them. review_3: It a great game. And maybe it's my head set but my get stuck under the boards sometimes or it's hard to pickup stuff. Over all I think it's a pretty great game. I think the tech is not all the way there yet for hand tracking

review_5: Me and my son are beyond amazed by this game we have had so many hours of fun we laughed so hard!!! Honestly the ingenuity and the aspects that they put into this game is phenomenal we are literally mind blown!!! It doesn't need to be complicated to be fun and that's exactly what this is it's just fun it's learning it's playing it's gaming it's giggling it's everything that you look for to sit down and relax and decompress. Thank you to the developers because this has been a huge positivity in this household!!
